pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wannier90 is an electronic-structure software computing maximally-localized Wannier functions (MLWF). It works on top of other electronic-structure software, such as Abinit, FLEUR, and PwSCF. The project and associated repository on Launchpad only deal with patches over the official release, as well as its packaging into the Debian and Ubuntu distributions.
